00029 // Commonly used frequencies can be added here, in fixed point Q12.20 notation
00030 #define SYS_FREQ_500MHZ         (500 << 20)
00031 #define SYS_FREQ_400MHZ         (400 << 20)     // Ideal Meta HTP clock
00032 #define SYS_FREQ_360MHZ         (360 << 20)     // Typical Meta HTP clock
00033 #define SYS_FREQ_200MHZ         (200 << 20)     // Ideal UCC0, UCC1, memory, sysinf, 2d/pdp/lcd clock
00034 #define SYS_FREQ_180MHZ         (180 << 20)     // Default Comet Bringup Clock Speed
00035 #define SYS_FREQ_160MHZ         (160 << 20)     // Default IMG clock speed 160MHz
00036 #define SYS_FREQ_1_8432MHZ              (0x001D7DBF)            // UART CLK Min
00037 #define SYS_FREQ_25MHZ                  (0x01900000)            // UART Clk Ideal
00038 #define RTC_FREQ                                (0x00008312)            // 32kHz
00039 
00040 #define BASE_MEMBERS                                                                                                                                                                                            \
00041                                                                                                 \
00044         IMG_BOOL                bConfigure;                                                                                                                                                                             \
00045                                                                                                                                 \
00046         IMG_BOOL                bEnable;                                                                                                                                                                                \
00047 
00048 #define TARGET_FRQUENCY_MEMBERS                                                                                                                                                                         \
00049                 \

00051                                                                 \
00052         IMG_UINT32              ui32TargetFreq_fp;                                                                                                                                                              \
00053                                                 \
00054         IMG_UINT32              ui32ActualFreq_fp;                                                                                                                                                              \
00055

00066 // The source clock for a block to use
00067 typedef enum
00068 {
00069         CLOCK_SOURCE_PLL,
00070         CLOCK_SOURCE_XTAL1,
00071         CLOCK_SOURCE_XTAL2,
00072         CLOCK_SOURCE_XTALUSB,
00073         CLOCK_SOURCE_SYS_UNDELETED,
00074         CLOCK_SOURCE_ADC_PLL,
00075         CLOCK_SOURCE_AFE_PROGDIV1,
00076         CLOCK_SOURCE_AFE_PROGDIV2,
00077         CLOCK_SOURCE_AFE_PROGDIV3,
00078         CLOCK_SOURCE_UCC0_IF,
00079         CLOCK_SOURCE_UCC1_IF,
00080         CLOCK_SOURCE_USB_PLL,
00081         CLOCK_SOURCE_USB_PHY,
00082         CLOCK_SOURCE_AFE_RXSYNC,
00083         CLOCK_SOURCE_EXT_ADC_DAC,
00084 } CLOCK_eSource;
00085 
00086 /* The following is a list of possible control sources for PDM A and PDM B */
00087 typedef enum
00088 {
00089         PDM_SOURCE_UCC0_EXT_CONTROL_1,
00090         PDM_SOURCE_UCC0_EXT_CONTROL_2,
00091         PDM_SOURCE_UCC1_EXT_CONTROL_1,
00092         PDM_SOURCE_UCC1_EXT_CONTROL_2
00093 } PDM_eControlSource;
00094 /* The following is a list of possible gain sources for PDM C and PDM D */
00095 typedef enum
00096 {
00097         PDM_SOURCE_UCC0_EXT_GAIN_1,
00098         PDM_SOURCE_UCC0_EXT_GAIN_2,
00099         PDM_SOURCE_UCC1_EXT_GAIN_1,
00100         PDM_SOURCE_UCC1_EXT_GAIN_2
00101 } PDM_eGainSource;
00102 /* The following is a list of possible PDM Pad sources */
00103 typedef enum
00104 {
00105         PDM_PAD_SOURCE_PDM,
00106         PDM_PAD_SOURCE_SYMBOL_UCC0,
00107         PDM_PAD_SOURCE_SYMBOL_UCC1
00108 } PDM_ePadSource;
00109 
00110 typedef enum
00111 {
00112         RANGE_1V_P2P = 0,
00113         RANGE_2V_P2P
00114 } ADC_eInputRange;

00124 typedef struct SYS_tag_sConfig
00125 {
00127         IMG_BOOL                        bSetupSystemClock;
00128         struct
00129         {
00132                 CLOCK_eSource           eMetaClockSource;
00134                 IMG_UINT8                       ui8SysClockDivider;
00137                 CLOCK_eSource           ePLLSource;
00139                 IMG_UINT16                      ui16MetaClockDeletion;
00141                 IMG_UINT16                      ui16SysClockDeletion;
00143                 IMG_UINT8                       ui8DDRClkDivider;
00145                 IMG_UINT32                      ui32TargetFreq_fp;
00146         } sSystemClock;
00151         IMG_UINT32                      ui32ActualFreq_fp;
00153         IMG_UINT32                      ui32XTAL2Freq_fp;
00155         IMG_BOOL                        bUseXTAL2AsOsc;
00156 
00158         struct
00159         {
00160                 IMG_BOOL                bEnable;
00161 
00162                 /* Clock deletion for a UCC */
00163                 IMG_UINT16                      ui16ClkDeletion;
00164 
00165                 /* Clock source for IF_CLK */
00166                 IMG_BOOL                        bEnableIFClock;
00167                 CLOCK_eSource           eIFClockSource;
00168 
00169                 /* Clock source for ext_stc_clk */
00170                 IMG_BOOL                        bEnableSTCClock;
00171                 CLOCK_eSource           eSTCClockSource;
00172 
00173                 /* Set to true to enable UCC0 DAC clock */
00174                 IMG_BOOL                        bEnableUCC0DACClk;
00175 
00176                 /* Set to true to have the UCC use the external ADC interface (this can be used for (bring up only) digital playout input) */
00177                 /* Set to false to have the UCC use the internal ADC interface (default) */
00178                 IMG_BOOL                        bUseExternalADC;
00179 
00180         } sUCCConfig;
00181 
00183         IMG_BOOL                        bEnableWIFI;
00184 
00185 } SYS_sConfig;

00237 typedef struct SYS_tag_sUSBConfig
00238 {
00239         BASE_MEMBERS;
00240         CLOCK_SOURCE_OVERRIDE_MEMBERS;
00241 
00242         /* Set to true to have the API calculate the required dividers for the phy clock speed specified in ePHYClock */
00243         IMG_BOOL                        bTargetPHYClock;
00244         /* If using the USB XTAL, this specifies the frequency of that XTAL */
00245         /* If not using the USB XTAL, this specific the frequency that the PHY should run at */
00246         enum
00247         {
00248                 PHY_eNotSet =   0,
00249                 PHY_e12         =       12,
00250                 PHY_e24         =       24,
00251                 PHY_e48         =       48
00252         } ePHYClock;
00253 
00254 } SYS_sUSBConfig;
00255 
00256 typedef struct SYS_tag_sClockOutConfig
00257 {
00258         BASE_MEMBERS;
00259         CLOCK_SOURCE_OVERRIDE_MEMBERS;
00260         IMG_BOOL                        bOverrideDivider;
00261         IMG_UINT8                       ui8Divider;
00262         /* Set to true to invert clockout */
00263         IMG_BOOL                        bInvertClkOutput;
00264 
00265 } SYS_sClockOutConfig;
00266

00273         CLOCK_eSource           ePLLSource;
00274 
00275 } SYS_sADCPLLClockConfig;
00276 
00277 typedef struct SYS_tag_sAFEConfig
00278 {
00281         IMG_BOOL                                        bOverrideDivider;
00283         IMG_UINT8                                       ui8Divider;
00284 
00285         CLOCK_SOURCE_OVERRIDE_MEMBERS;
00286 
00287         struct
00288         {
00289                 IMG_BOOL                        bConfigure;
00290                 IMG_BOOL                        bEnable;
00291 
00292                 /* If the AFE PLL is enabled, setting this to the desired sample rate will configure the dividers appropriately */
00293                 IMG_UINT32                      ui32SampleRate_fp;
00294                 /* The actual sample rate configured */
00295                 IMG_UINT32                      ui32ActualRate_fp;
00296 
00297                 /* Configures the RXADC input voltage range */
00298                 ADC_eInputRange         eInputRange;
00299 
00300         } sRxADC;
00301 
00302         struct
00303         {
00304                 IMG_BOOL                        bConfigure;
00305                 IMG_BOOL                        bEnable;
00306 
00307                 /* If the AFE PLL is enabled, setting this to the desired sample rate will configure the dividers appropriately */
00308                 IMG_UINT32                      ui32SampleRate_fp;
00309                 /* The actual sample rate configured */
00310                 IMG_UINT32                      ui32ActualRate_fp;
00311 
00312                 /* IMG_FALSE indicates DAC should be set to output common mode voltage of 0.6V, IMG_TRUE indicated 1.2V */
00313                 IMG_BOOL                        bCommonMode1v2;
00314 
00315         } sTxDAC;
00316 
00317         struct
00318         {
00319                 IMG_BOOL                        bConfigureADC;
00320                 IMG_BOOL                        bEnableADC;
00321 
00322                 IMG_BOOL                        bConfigureDAC;
00323                 IMG_BOOL                        bEnableDAC;
00324 
00325                 /* If the AFE PLL is enabled, setting this to the desired sample rate will configure the dividers appropriately */
00326                 IMG_UINT32                      ui32SampleRate_fp;
00327                 /* The actual sample rate configured */
00328                 IMG_UINT32                      ui32ActualRate_fp;
00329 
00330                 enum
00331                 {
00332                         DATA_SOURCE_AFE_AUXDACIN_REG = 0,
00333                         DATA_SOURCE_UCC0_EXT_GAIN_1,
00334                         DATA_SOURCE_UCC0_EXT_CONTROL_1
00335                 } eDACDataSource;
00336 
00337         } sAux;
00338 
00339         struct
00340         {
00341                 IMG_BOOL                        bConfigure;
00342                 IMG_BOOL                        bEnable;
00343 
00344                 /* If the AFE PLL is enabled, setting this to the desired sample rate will configure the dividers appropriately */
00345                 IMG_UINT32                      ui32SampleRate_fp;
00346                 /* The actual sample rate configured */
00347                 IMG_UINT32                      ui32ActualRate_fp;
00348 
00349                 /* Set to true to use the AFE's internal PLL as the IQADC's clock source */
00350                 /* Set to false to use the external clock input. This source can be configured with the structure below. */
00351                 IMG_BOOL                        bUseInternalPLL;
00352 
00353                 struct
00354                 {
00355                         /* If the above is set to false, use the following to configure the external IQADC clock input
00356                                 -- Possible values are: XTAL1, XTAL2, ADC_PLL, SYS_CLK_UNDELETED */
00357                         CLOCK_eSource           eClockSource;
00358 
00359                         /* Set to true to override the ADCPLLDIV divider manually. Must be set to false if the API should calculate
00360                                 the divider values for a target frequency (bTargetFreq) */
00361                         IMG_BOOL                        bOverrideDivider;
00362 
00363                         /* The divide value */
00364                         IMG_UINT8                       ui8Divider;
00365 
00366                         /* Set to true to have the API calculate the required ADCPLLDIV divider for the target frequency specified below */
00367                         IMG_BOOL                        bTargetFreq;
00368 
00369                         /* The desired external clock frequency, in MHz, Q12.20 format */
00370                         IMG_UINT32                      ui32TargetFreq_fp;
00371                 } sExtClock;
00372 
00373                 /* Configures the IQADC input voltage range */
00374                 ADC_eInputRange         eInputRange;
00375 
00376         } sIQADC;
00377 
00378         /* Set to true to enable the AFE's internal PLL. The reference clock to the PLL is set up by using the AFE SYS_sBlockConfig structure.
00379                 When set to true, the PLL will feed the RxADC, TxDAC, AuxADC/DAC, and optionally the IQADC */
00380         /* Set to false to bypass the AFE's internal PLL. The AFE source clock, configured in the AFE SYS_sBlockConfig structure, will directly feed the
00381                 RxADC, TxDAC, and AuxADC/DAC */
00382         IMG_BOOL                        bEnablePLL;
00383 
00384         /* Set to true when bEnablePLL is true to internally bypass the AFE's internal PLL.
00385                 This will result in the Fin being the same as Fvco */
00386         IMG_BOOL                        bBypassPLL;
00387 
00388         /* Set to true to _not_ reset the AFE before configuring */
00389         IMG_BOOL                        bNoReset;
00390 
00391 } SYS_sAFEConfig;
